[{"answerOver":false,"question":{"createTime":1466708957000,"questionContent":"1.\u00A0您的年龄在以下哪个范围内？\u00A0","riskQuestionId":1,"sort":1,"state":"01","updateTime":1467596112000,"yn":true},"questionOpts":[{"optionContent":"A.\u00A029岁以下","questionId":1,"riskOptionId":23,"score":1,"sort":1},{"optionContent":"B.\u00A030-39岁\u00A0","questionId":1,"riskOptionId":24,"score":3,"sort":2},{"optionContent":"C.\u00A040-49岁","questionId":1,"riskOptionId":25,"score":2,"sort":3},{"optionContent":"D.\u00A050-59岁","questionId":1,"riskOptionId":63,"score":3,"sort":4},{"optionContent":"E.\u00A060岁以上","questionId":1,"riskOptionId":64,"score":0,"sort":5}],"selectOptionScore":0},{"answerOver":false,"question":{"createTime":1467110681000,"questionContent":"2.您有过几年的投资经验？","riskQuestionId":2,"sort":2,"state":"01","updateTime":1467596178000,"yn":true},"questionOpts":[{"optionContent":"A.\u00A010年以上","questionId":2,"riskOptionId":55,"score":3,"sort":1},{"optionContent":"B.\u00A06-10年","questionId":2,"riskOptionId":56,"score":4,"sort":2},{"optionContent":"C.\u00A03-5年","questionId":2,"riskOptionId":61,"score":1,"sort":4},{"optionContent":"D.\u00A01-2年","questionId":2,"riskOptionId":62,"score":0,"sort":5},{"optionContent":"E.\u00A01年以下","questionId":2,"riskOptionId":65,"score":0,"sort":5}],"selectOptionScore":0},{"answerOver":false,"question":{"createTime":1467596246000,"questionContent":"3.您是否有过投资经验？","riskQuestionId":9,"sort":3,"state":"01","updateTime":1467542246000,"yn":true},"questionOpts":[{"optionContent":"A.\u00A0有投资贵金属、外汇、期货、期权等高风险衍生品经验","questionId":9,"riskOptionId":66,"score":10,"sort":1},{"optionContent":"B.\u00A0有投资股票、股票型基金的经验","questionId":9,"riskOptionId":67,"score":8,"sort":2},{"optionContent":"C.\u00A0有购买过银行的理财产品、债券基金、分红型、投连险","questionId":9,"riskOptionId":68,"score":5,"sort":3},{"optionContent":"D.\u00A0有购买过保本基金、货币基金（如余额宝）、信托等低风险产品","questionId":9,"riskOptionId":69,"score":3,"sort":4},{"optionContent":"E.\u00A0从未有过投资经历，只存银行的定期或活期","questionId":9,"riskOptionId":70,"score":0,"sort":5}],"selectOptionScore":0},{"answerOver":false,"question":{"createTime":1467596360000,"questionContent":"4.您的家庭目前全年收入状况如何？","riskQuestionId":10,"sort":4,"state":"01","updateTime":1467542361000,"yn":true},"questionOpts":[{"optionContent":"A.\u00A050万元以上","questionId":10,"riskOptionId":71,"score":10,"sort":1},{"optionContent":"B.\u00A030-50万元","questionId":10,"riskOptionId":72,"score":8,"sort":2},{"optionContent":"C.\u00A015-30万元","questionId":10,"riskOptionId":73,"score":5,"sort":3},{"optionContent":"D.\u00A05-15万元","questionId":10,"riskOptionId":74,"score":3,"sort":4},{"optionContent":"E.\u00A05万元以下","questionId":10,"riskOptionId":75,"score":0,"sort":5}],"selectOptionScore":0},{"answerOver":false,"question":{"createTime":1467596437000,"questionContent":"5.您投资的主要目的是什么？选择最符合您的一个描述：","riskQuestionId":11,"sort":5,"state":"01","updateTime":1467542437000,"yn":true},"questionOpts":[{"optionContent":"A.\u00A0关心长期的高回报，能够接受短期的资产价值波动。","questionId":11,"riskOptionId":76,"score":10,"sort":1},{"optionContent":"B.\u00A0倾向长期的成长，较少关心短期的回报以及波动。","questionId":11,"riskOptionId":77,"score":8,"sort":2},{"optionContent":"C.\u00A0希望投资能获得一定的增值，同时获得波动适度的年回报。","questionId":11,"riskOptionId":78,"score":5,"sort":3},{"optionContent":"D.\u00A0只想确保资产的安全性，同时希望能够得到固定的收益。","questionId":11,"riskOptionId":79,"score":3,"sort":4},{"optionContent":"E.\u00A0希望利用投资以及投资所获得的收益在短期内用于大额的购买计划。","questionId":11,"riskOptionId":80,"score":0,"sort":5}],"selectOptionScore":0},{"answerOver":false,"question":{"createTime":1467596522000,"questionContent":"6.当您进行投资时（例如基金、股票），您能接受一年内损失多少？","riskQuestionId":12,"sort":6,"state":"01","updateTime":1467542523000,"yn":true},"questionOpts":[{"optionContent":"A.\u00A0我能承受25％以上亏损","questionId":12,"riskOptionId":81,"score":10,"sort":1},{"optionContent":"B.\u00A0我能承受10-20％的亏损\u00A0","questionId":12,"riskOptionId":82,"score":8,"sort":2},{"optionContent":"C.\u00A0我最多只能承受5-10%的亏损","questionId":12,"riskOptionId":83,"score":5,"sort":3},{"optionContent":"D.\u00A0我最多只能承受5%以下的亏损","questionId":12,"riskOptionId":84,"score":3,"sort":4},{"optionContent":"E.\u00A0我几乎不能承受任何亏损","questionId":12,"riskOptionId":85,"score":0,"sort":5}],"selectOptionScore":0},{"answerOver":false,"question":{"createTime":1467596878000,"questionContent":"7.目前您的投资主要是哪一品种？","riskQuestionId":13,"sort":7,"state":"01","updateTime":1467597094000,"yn":true},"questionOpts":[{"optionContent":"A.\u00A0外汇、期货、现货贵金属\u00A0等超高风险资产","questionId":13,"riskOptionId":86,"score":10,"sort":1},{"optionContent":"B.\u00A0股票、股票基金、私募股权基金\u00A0等高风险资产","questionId":13,"riskOptionId":87,"score":8,"sort":2},{"optionContent":"C.\u00A0混合基金、指数基金、结构类产品\u00A0等较高风险资产","questionId":13,"riskOptionId":88,"score":5,"sort":3},{"optionContent":"D.\u00A0银行理财产品、信托、固定收益类基金（有限合伙基金）、货币基金(如余额宝）","questionId":13,"riskOptionId":89,"score":3,"sort":4},{"optionContent":"E.\u00A0活期、定期存款、国债、保险\u00A0","questionId":13,"riskOptionId":90,"score":0,"sort":5}],"selectOptionScore":0},{"answerOver":false,"question":{"createTime":1467596943000,"questionContent":"8.如果您拥有50万用来建立资产组合，您会选择下面哪一个组合？","riskQuestionId":14,"sort":8,"state":"01","updateTime":1467597108000,"yn":true},"questionOpts":[{"optionContent":"A.\u00A0低风险投资、一般风险投资、高风险投资的比重分别为\u00A05\u00A0\u00A0：15\u00A0：80\u00A0","questionId":14,"riskOptionId":91,"score":10,"sort":1},{"optionContent":"B.\u00A0低风险投资、一般风险投资、高风险投资的比重分别为\u00A010\u00A0：30\u00A0：60","questionId":14,"riskOptionId":92,"score":8,"sort":2},{"optionContent":"C.\u00A0低风险投资、一般风险投资、高风险投资的比重分别为\u00A030\u00A0：40\u00A0：30","questionId":14,"riskOptionId":93,"score":5,"sort":3},{"optionContent":"D.\u00A0低风险投资、一般风险投资、高风险投资的比重分别为\u00A060\u00A0：30\u00A0：10","questionId":14,"riskOptionId":94,"score":3,"sort":4},{"optionContent":"E.\u00A0低风险投资、一般风险投资、高风险投资的比重分别为\u00A080\u00A0：15\u00A0：5","questionId":14,"riskOptionId":95,"score":0,"sort":5}],"selectOptionScore":0},{"answerOver":false,"question":{"createTime":1467596992000,"questionContent":"9.长期风险承受水平：下面哪一种描述最符合您可接受的价值波动程度？","riskQuestionId":15,"sort":9,"state":"01","updateTime":1467542993000,"yn":true},"questionOpts":[{"optionContent":"A.\u00A0希望赚取最高回报潜力，能接受3年以上的负面波动，包括损失本金","questionId":15,"riskOptionId":96,"score":10,"sort":1},{"optionContent":"B.\u00A0希望赚取较高回报潜力，能接受3年以上的负面波动","questionId":15,"riskOptionId":97,"score":8,"sort":2},{"optionContent":"C.\u00A0寻求资金较高收益，可接受3年内负面波动，使回报显著高于定期存款","questionId":15,"riskOptionId":98,"score":5,"sort":3},{"optionContent":"D.\u00A0保守投资，但愿意在2年内接受少许负面波动，使回报高于定期存款","questionId":15,"riskOptionId":99,"score":3,"sort":4},{"optionContent":"E.\u00A0不希望投资本金承担风险。我愿意接受的回报大约与定期存款一样","questionId":15,"riskOptionId":100,"score":0,"sort":5}],"selectOptionScore":0},{"answerOver":false,"question":{"createTime":1467597052000,"questionContent":"10.假设现有以下几个投资品种，那您会选择哪一个？","riskQuestionId":16,"sort":10,"state":"01","updateTime":1467543052000,"yn":true},"questionOpts":[{"optionContent":"A.\u00A0收益率在30%以上，同时本金也有可能亏损20%以上","questionId":16,"riskOptionId":101,"score":10,"sort":1},{"optionContent":"B.\u00A0本金不保证，收益率在20%以内，同时本金也有可能亏损10%以内","questionId":16,"riskOptionId":102,"score":8,"sort":2},{"optionContent":"C.\u00A0本息保证，收益率在10%左右","questionId":16,"riskOptionId":103,"score":5,"sort":3},{"optionContent":"D.\u00A0本息保证，收益率在4-6%之间","questionId":16,"riskOptionId":104,"score":3,"sort":4},{"optionContent":"E. 银行定期存款，收益率在3%","questionId":16,"riskOptionId":105,"score":0,"sort":5}],"selectOptionScore":0}]
